means: 使不安( disconcert的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The ambassador was clearly disconcerted by the British reaction.
sentence.Network_cn: 显然，英国的反应让这位大使很不安。

sentence.Network_en: He was disconcerted to find his fellow diners already seated.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很窘迫地发现和他一起就餐的其他人已经入座了。
安东尼的怪笑让萨克利夫不知所措。

PerfectNetExp.abs: disconcert ... disconcert 慌乱 disconcerted 心烦意乱的, 不安的 n. 失措; 挫折.
disconcert 使惊惶disconcerted 不安的disconcertedly 不安地
annoying恼人的disconcerted 受窘的humiliated感到羞耻
lily was not easily disconcerted .丽莉不是轻易气馁的女人.

list.abs: for COSMOLOGISTS , it was like the brakes and feeling the car speed up , an exhilarating but disconcerting sensation that something wasn't working quite .对宇宙学家而言，目前的景况像是猛踩煞车，却感觉车速攀升。这是一种兴奋中掺杂了些许不安的情绪，因为事情似乎不太对劲。
disconcerted with 不满disconcerted look 神色不安disconcerting 令人难堪
Vto astonish or disconcert 使惊讶; 迷惑vt. 使吃惊；惊吓
if a speaker looks at you continuously when speaking , as if he tries to dominate you , you will feel disconcerted .如果一个讲话者不停地看着一当他说话的时候，仿佛他尽力提醒你，你将会感觉不安。

entry.def: If something disconcerts you, it makes you feel anxious, confused, or embarrassed.

example.tran: 安东尼的怪笑让萨克利夫不知所措。

example.ex: The ambassador was clearly disconcerted by the British reaction.
example.tran: 显然，英国的反应让这位大使很不安。

means.word_mean: 1. having self-possession upset; thrown into confusion;

sentences.sentence: "the hecklers pelted the discombobulated speaker with anything that came to hand"
"looked at each other dumbly, quite disconcerted"- G.B.Shaw

auth_sentence.content: The scheme was...completely disconcerted by the course which the civil war took.
auth_sentence.res_content: The scheme was...completely disconcerted by the course which the civil war took.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The scheme was...completely disconcerted by the course which the civil war took.

auth_sentence.content: When I saw the venue on the tickets I had a disconcerted moment.
auth_sentence.res_content: When I saw the venue on the tickets I had a disconcerted moment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When I saw the venue on the tickets I had a disconcerted moment.

auth_sentence.content: Maybe not, but something that seriously disconcerted the authorities surely did happen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe not, but something that seriously disconcerted the authorities surely did happen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe not, but something that seriously disconcerted the authorities surely did happen.
